title: unspecified error occurred. please check the logs for more information
body: Any tips how to fix it ?

replies.body: Most of the time those unexpected errors happen when they client loses its connection with our servers and the client isn't sure what happened. Let's check up on some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is in order there. Hit me back up if that's not helping!
